# Analysis

```{r Plot Function}
    plot.mds <- function(x, t = "", k = 3, f.size = 12) {
     # Compute MDS
     mds <- x %>%
       dist() %>% 
       cmdscale() %>%
       as_tibble()
     colnames(mds) <- c("Dim.1", "Dim.2")
     # Clustering
     hclus.cent <- eclust(mds, "hclust", 
                       method = "ward.D2",
                       k = k, graph = FALSE)$cluster %>% 
        as.factor() %>% 
        as_tibble() %>% 
        cbind(mds)  %>% 
        group_by(value) %>% 
        summarize(across(starts_with("Dim"), mean)) %>% 
        dplyr::select(-1)
     km.clust <- eclust(mds, 
                       "kmeans", k = hclus.cent, graph = FALSE)$cluster %>% 
       as.factor()
      mds <- mds %>%
        mutate(groups = km.clust)
      # Plot and color by groups
      p <- ggscatter(mds, x = "Dim.1", y = "Dim.2", 
              label = rownames(x),
              color = "groups",
              palette = "Dark2",
              size = 1.5,
              font.label = f.size,
              label.rectangle = TRUE,
              ellipse.type = "convex",
              ellipse = TRUE,
              ellipse.alpha = 0.25,
              ellipse.border.remove = TRUE,
              repel = TRUE)
      p <- p + theme_minimal()
      p <- p + theme(legend.position = "none", 
                     axis.text = element_text(size = 16),
                     axis.title = element_text(size = 20),
                     title = element_text(size = 24)
                     )
      p <- p + ggtitle(t)
    return(p)
    }
```
